sentence.Network_en: She was exceedingly wrathful and struck at Hurstwood, who dodged.
sentence.Network_cn: 她愤怒至极,对着赫斯渥就是一棍子, 赫斯渥躲开了.

sentence.Network_en: The wrathful crowd surged forward. The rascal backed away in fear.
sentence.Network_cn: 愤怒的人群涌向前去, 那个无赖吓得后退了.

sentence.Network_en: Meanwhile the choleric Captain strode wrathful away to the council.
sentence.Network_cn: 同时暴躁的上校满腔怒火走进集会.
